p: A mixture of 3a (2.81 g, 10 mmol) with each of either malononitrile ( 4a) (0.66 g, 10 mmol) or ethyl cyanoacetate ( 4b) (1.13 g, 10 mmol) was fused in the presence of ammonium acetate (1.54 g, 20 mmol) at 150 °C for 30 min, then left to stand at room temperature and triturated with absolute ethanol. The solid products so formed were collected by filtration and recrystallised from ethanol/DMF to give 6a and 6b, respectively.
